page.title: 17KENILWORTH CASTLE
page.content: OPENING TIMES. 15TH MARCH TO 15TH OCTOBER WEEKDAYS 09.30-16.00. SUNDAYS 14.00-18.30. APRIL 1ST TO 30TH SEPTEMBER, SUNDAY MORNINGS 09.30-14.00 16TH OCTOBER TO 14TH MARCH. WEEKDAYS 09.30-16.00 SUNDAYS 14.00- 16.00 CLOSED CHRISTMAS EVE, CHRISTMAS DAY, BOXING DAY AND NEW YEARS DAY. COST OF ADMISSION ADULTS 80P, CHILDREN 40P, OAP 40P. WITH A RESIDENTS PASS,OBTAINABLE FROM THE COUNCIL HOUSE IN SOUTHBANK ROAD, KENILWORTH, RESIDENTS OF KENILWORTH HAVE FREE ADMISSION. EVENTS AT THE CASTLE 1ST WEEK IN MAY, TWO CASTLES RUN. 1ST WEEK IN MAY, MAY FAYRE. JULY, COUNTRY DANCING AND CARNIVAL FLOAT JUDGING. DECEMBER, CAROL SINGING
